programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team profiles a kidnapper who abducts a teen (Elisabeth Harnois) and demands $500,000 for her return. But what's most intriguing is his fixation on the girl's twin sister: She is the only person he wants to talk to and he demands that she make the drop-off. Meanwhile, Hotch learns that his pregnant wife is having contractions, but she insists that he stay on the case and save the girl. Evan Davenport: Robin Thomas. Vincent Shyer: Matthew Letscher(n)

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team profiles a kidnapper who abducts a teen (Elisabeth Harnois) and demands $500,000 for her return. But what's most intriguing is his fixation on the girl's twin sister: She is the only person he wants to talk to and he demands that she make the drop-off. programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, `Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.title: NFL Primetime
programme.desc: Highlights and in-depth analysis of National Football League action. Launched in 1987, the show was a popular lead-in to ESPN's Sunday-night NFL coverage for two decades before moving to Mondays in 2006. The original format delivered game clips, statistics and analysis at an unrelenting pace to sate the fervent fan base of the NFL(n)

programme.title: Monday Night Football
programme.desc: Buffalo (5-4) at New England (9-0). The Patriots held off division-rival Buffalo 40-32 in Week 2 behind a 466-yard, 3-TD day from Tom Brady, who improved to 24-3 in the series. Bills RB Karlos Williams has TDs in his first six NFL games, tying the record set by New England's Robert Edwards in 1998(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, `Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.title: Bad Santa (2003)
programme.desc: A hilariously criminal Santa finds a measure of holiday redemption when he befriends a troubled kid. The traditional Christmas tale will never be the same after this cleverly twisted, merrily irreverent story of a Santa so bad that he's funny. Billy Bob Thornton stars (in a Golden Globe-nominated role) as Willie T. Stokes, a washed-up, wisecracking department store Santa who is only in the business for the criminal opportunities. Every Christmas Eve this Santa and his ingenious Elf' Willie's midget partner-in-crime Marcus (Tony Cox), crack the store safe and make off with their own holiday stash. But this year Santa and his Elf find their annual heist endangered by a pesky store manager (John Ritter), a savvy mall detective (Bernie Mac), a sexy Santa fan (Lauren Graham) and an 8-year-old misfit (Brett Kelly) who decides to believe that Willie: intoxicated, acid-tongued and felonious as he is, is the real Santa(n)

Gideon, a supposed psychic, is Stan's mortal enemy. When he gets enamoured of Mabel he invites her to meet him. She doesn't want to go, but also doesn't want to break his heart in front of other people - so Dipper does it for her(n)

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: For twins Dipper and Mabel Pines it is bad enough when their parents ship them off to Gravity Falls to spend the summer with their great uncle Stan, who runs a tourist trap museum. But little do they know that there really is something very strange going on in Gravity Falls. Dipper tries to impress Wendy by acting older than he is. They go on a trip that leads to an old abandoned convenience store where Dipper and Mabel encounter the ghosts of an elderly couple who hate teenagers(n)

programme.title: Spy Kids (2001)
programme.desc: That precocious pair of mini master spies Carmen and Juni Cortez are back in this blockbuster sequel, saving the world from certain doom. This time around the brother and sister are actually official junior spies at the Agency, alongside parents Gregorio (Antonio Banderas) and Ingrid (Carla Gugino). But they have competition: another couple of susperspy siblings called Gary and Gerti Giggles are also fighting evil. So there's competition to rush to the rescue when mad scientist Romero, who lives on an island peopled by genetically mutated animals, invents a transmooker device which can shut off all the electricity on Earth. This fun-filled movie is packed with gadgets and gizmos, effects and stunts, as well as having a star-studded cast. A big hit at the cinema, this film is a bumper bundle of entertainment for parents and kids alike(n)

Accidentally whisked away from home and into the clutches of a neighborhood bully, these two squabbling rivals must work together as a team if they are to escape. programme.title: Toy Story 2 (1999)
programme.desc: The toys are back in town! Yes, Woody, Buzz and all the other characters from 1995 Disney blockbuster Toy Story are back in this stunning sequel, voiced as before by top stars like Tom Hanks and Tim Allen. Taking the science of computer animation to an even higher level, the film uses state-of-the-art technology to tell spellbinding stories. Andy, who owns the toys, has gone off to cowboy camp and left the toys to their own devices - and toys will be toys. Woody is kidnapped by a collector, who knows he's a valuable toy from a 1950s show called Woody's Roundup. Soon Woody meets all his co-stars and makes new friends, while his old friends rush to rescue him before Andy gets back. This is modern story-telling at its best: a real must see movie(n)

programme.desc: "Life Today" is much more than a television program. It is life-giving ministry every day in some way for people around the world. Betty and I love to read those letters that say, "That program today was for me!" Each testimony is a reminder of our awesome responsibility to share God's love and to reach people in their time of need(n)

programme.title: Joyce Meyer Ministries: Enjoying Everyday Life

She teaches on a number of topics with a particular focus on the mind, mouth, moods and attitudes(n)

programme.title: Gilmore Girls

programme.title: 700 Club Interactive
programme.desc: Matters of faith are discussed in this interactive talk show, featuring viewer calls and live chats(n)

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. It mixes news---from a religious perspective---with inspirational interviews with celebrities, along with Bible readings and entertainment. Conservative icon (and 1988 presidential candidate) Pat Robertson founded the hugely popular program from a 1963 fund-raising pledge effort on UHF TV in Virginia(n)

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Sue begins learning how to drive and injures Axl's foot, jeopardizing his ability to play football. Meanwhile, Brick has a surprising reaction to overindulging in Halloween candy; and Axl prepares to vote for the first time(n)

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Frankie clashes with her stern teacher at dental-assisting school. Meanwhile, Axl's parents pressure him to get a tutor to help improve his grades; and Sue and Brick believe they've found a coveted item, so they bring it to a pawn shop(n)

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Mr. Ehlert forces the staff to work on Thanksgiving, throwing a wrench in the Hecks' plans for a festive family feast. Meanwhile, Frankie and Mike approve of Sue's first boyfriend, who's a safer choicer than even Sue knows; and Axl loses Brick in a corn maze(n)

programme.title: The Middle

programme.title: The Middle

programme.title: The Middle

programme.title: Monsters, Inc. (2001)
programme.desc: In the city of Monstropolis, hulking, blue-furred behemoth James P. Sulley Sullivan and his one-eyed wisecracking best friend Mike Wazowski are employed by Monsters, Inc., a scream processing factory that thrives on the screams of kids spooked by monsters lurking under their beds and in their closets. It's the job of Sulley, Mike, and their co-workers to keep the frights flowing. programme.desc: SpongeBob is a sea sponge who lives with his pet snail, Gary, in a fully furnished, two bedroom pineapple in the town of Bikini Bottom. SpongeBob's dream in life is to be the ocean's ultimate fry cook, and thanks to his job flipping Krabby Patties at the Krusty Krab, he lives that dream every day. SpongeBob is as optimistic and earnest as a sea-dwelling sponge gets, but he can't seem to avoid getting himself, and usually everyone else around him, into trouble. SpongeBob is as optimistic and earnest as a sea-dwelling sponge gets, but he can't seem to avoid getting himself, and usually everyone else around him, into trouble. While trying too hard, he tends to do things wrong...really wrong...which usually spells "disaster." However, SpongeBob's always looking on the bright side of life; his enthusiasm and curiosity about the world make him downright irresistible or completely annoying. programme.title: Erin Brockovich (2000)
programme.desc: Erin Brockovich is an unemployed single mother, desperate to find a job, but is having no luck.While no one takes her seriously, with her trashy clothes and earthy manners, that soon changes when she begins to investigate a suspicious real estate case involving the Pacific Gas & Electric Company. What she discovers is that the company is trying quietly to buy land that was contaminated by hexavalent chromium, and, in turn, poisoning the residents in the area. As she digs deeper, Erin finds herself leading point in a series of events that would involve her lawfirm in one of the biggest class action lawsuits in American history against a multi-billion dollar corporation(n)

programme.title: The Green Mile (1999)
programme.desc: Paul Edgecomb is a slightly cynical veteran prison guard on Death row in the 1930's. His faith, and sanity, deteriorated by watching men live and die; Edgecomb is about to have a complete turn around in attitude. Enter John Coffey; He's eight feet tall. He has hands the size of waffle irons. He's been accused of the murder of two children... and he's afraid to sleep in a cell without a night-light. And Edgecomb, as well as the other prison guards - Brutus, a sympathetic guard, and Percy, a stuck up, perverse, and violent person, are in for a strange experience that involves intelligent mice, brutal executions, and the revelation about Coffey's innocence and his true identity(n)

programme.title: Remember the Titans (2000)
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars in this powerful and moving film about the early days of forced racial integration in the US, and how a high school football team helped bring in a new era of racial harmony. It's 1971. One all-white school and one all-black school have been forcibly merged, and a black coach appointed over the existing white football coach. It could be a recipe for disaster, but the two men shares certain qualities: integrity, honour and a strong work ethic. Together they mould a group of angry, disillusioned young men into a dynamic, winning football team - and provide a model for future integration. A top class film with a superb cast(n)

programme.title: Independence Day (1996)
programme.desc: Roland Emmerich's blockbuster of a science fiction film sees aliens reach Earth. And they're decidedly hostile - their plan is to suck the planet of all its resources and leave behind a burnt cinder circling the sun before moving on. Planting giant ships above the world's major cities, they unleash destruction on an unprecedented scale (superbly caught by the special effects). All attempts at fighting back are met by hordes of fighter craft until pilot Steven Hiller manages to down one and capture the pilot. In tandem, scientist David Levinson, having worked out their purpose, also works out a way to destroy them but he and Hiller need a space craft. Which brings them to a secret base near Las Vegas. The child of countless science fiction movies, Independence Day is rollicking, fast-moving fun and if the fate of the remains of the human race is never in doubt, there's enough tension and action to carry even the most jaundiced viewer along(n)

programme.title: Remember the Titans (2000)
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars in this powerful and moving film about the early days of forced racial integration in the US, and how a high school football team helped bring in a new era of racial harmony. It's 1971. One all-white school and one all-black school have been forcibly merged, and a black coach appointed over the existing white football coach. It could be a recipe for disaster, but the two men shares certain qualities: integrity, honour and a strong work ethic. Together they mould a group of angry, disillusioned young men into a dynamic, winning football team - and provide a model for future integration. A top class film with a superb cast(n)

programme.title: Jumanji (1995)
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars as Alan Parrish, who as a young boy discovers the mysterious board game Jumanji. When he sits down to play with his reluctant friend Sarah, strange things begin to happen. On the roll of the dice, Alan is transported into another world - the jungle realm of Jumanji - where he remains trapped for nearly 26 years. Decades later, when two new children, Judy and Peter, begin to play the game in the attic of Alan's childhood home, Alan is freed from the jungle world and emerges as a 38 year old survivor of the dangerous game. Together, the three reluctant players must find the now grown Sarah to finish the game before the game finishes them(n)

programme.title: Battleship (2012)
programme.desc: Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgårdstar star in Peter Berg's alien-invasion sci-fi action movie. Six years after NASA beamed a powerful signal to an Earth-like planet outside our solar system, we get a response. Only the extraterrestrials don't send a message: they come calling, landing five huge amphibious spacecraft in the Pacific, just as a US/Japanese naval exercise has begun. The visitors initially just seem wary, but a panicked reaction from our warships makes them reassess us as hostile and sparks a ferocious response. And so it falls to hot-headed US Navy officer Lieutenant Alex Hopper, his older brother Commander Stone Hopper and the commander of the fleet Admiral Shane to defeat a threat which is greater than they first think. Also starring singer Rihanna as a US Navy gunner, though perhaps the film's real star is its CGI special effects. Edited for language and violence(n)

programme.title: Tears of the Sun (2003)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis stars as Lieutenant Waters, a special ops commander in the US forces in this dramatic action film. When the democratic government of Nigeria is overthrown by rebels, Waters' team of specialists is deployed to rescue American doctor Lena Kendricks (Monica Bellucci), who is working in a remote village in the Nigerian jungle. But Kendricks will only go with them if the team agrees to bring all of the villagers to safety across the nearby Cameroon border. Defying his orders, Waters agrees, but the trek of refugees is pursued by an army of rebels who are bent on killing the entire group at any cost. Also stars Cole Hauser and Tom Skerritt(n)

programme.desc: Ang Lee directs this fantasy film based on Marvel's famous comic character created by Stan Lee and illustrated by Jack Kirby. Scientist Bruce Banner (Eric Bana), a genetics expert, works for the government on a project called Gamma, under General Ross (Sam Elliott). The objective is to create a legion of powerful soldiers to conquer Mars. But the experiment goes wrong and Banner's organism is affected by the gamma rays. Now, every time the scientist gets angry, he turns into Hulk, a gigantic green beast with an astounding, uncontrollable strength. To prevent anyone from getting hurt, especially his loved one, Betsy Ross (Jennifer Connelly), the scientist tries to move away from the city. But General Ross, Betsy's father, and much of the military machine pursue him mercilessly(n)

Chazz Michael Michaels (Will Ferrell) and Jimmy MacElroy (Jon Heder) confirm this theory and are archenemies when competing as ice skaters in the men¿s single category. Such is their rivalry that they are in a tight spot when by a twist of fate they have to share the gold medal at the International Winter Olympics. During the award ceremony, they get into such a fight that the Committee decides to suspend them from the event for life, although not all the way: suspension applies for the individual category, so their only chance to compete is participating as a male-male pair(n)

programme.desc: When the X-Men are targeted for death by giant robots called Sentinels, Wolverine travels through time to reshape the future by altering the course of a crucial historical event. In the process, he must work with a younger version of the mutant team(n)

programme.desc: An unemployed Navy veteran enrolls in community college and falls for his public-speaking teacher. Although initially apathetic, the married instructor gradually begins to feel as if her problems fade away whenever she's with her amiable student(n)

programme.title: The Theory of Everything (2014)
programme.desc: Biopic of the celebrated scientist Stephen Hawking. A graduate student at Cambridge, Hawking establishes himself as one of the leading minds of his generation, and begins to win the heart of a young woman named Jane. After one of his earliest breakthroughs, Hawking is diagnosed with ALS, and he becomes less and less able to control his own body. With the loyal Jane at his side, he continues his work(n)

programme.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) (2014)
programme.desc: A fading actor, best known for his portrayal of a superhero, plans a comeback by appearing in a Broadway play. However, his attempts to become more altruistic, rebuild his career and reconnect with friends and family prove more difficult than expected(n)

programme.title: Accepted (2006)
programme.desc: What happens when you want to go to college but no school accepts you? If you're Bartleby Gaines, you invent a fictitious university and create your own destiny. ACCEPTED follows the Ferris Bueller-esque Bartleby as he and his assembled crew of college rejects dupe the world by building the South Harmon Institute of Technology from scratch. There's his nerdy friend Sherman Schrader; the hyper-smart Rory; Hands, a football player who lost his scholarship when he blew out his knee.(n)

programme.title: House on Haunted Hill (1999)
programme.desc: Re-make of a classic horror tale about a millionaire who offers a million dollars to whoever can spend a night in a spooky mansion that was once an insane asylum and location of some horrifying experiments. When a group take up his offer they are unaware that their rich benefactor has rigged the house to have some fun for his money. But he becomes very unaware that the house might really be haunted(n)

programme.title: UCLA Dynasty
programme.desc: A look at the unparalleled success of the UCLA men's basketball program under coach John Wooden. The Bruins won 10 national titles in 12 years (1964-75) and also put together four undefeated seasons and a record 88-game winning streak. Included: interviews with Bruin stars Bill Walton, Sidney Wicks and Gail Goodrich; and a look at the 1968 game against Houston in the Astrodome(n)

programme.title: Blood Diamond (2006)
programme.desc: In the role that gave him his third Academy Award nomination, Leonardo DiCaprio stars Blood Diamond as a mercenary who wishes to transform his life by finding a rare pink diamond. In his quest, he is joined by Solomon Vandy, a man who was taken from his family, forced to work in the diamond fields. Sharing completely different life stories but united for the same purpose, both men embark on a trek through rebel territory, in a journey that could save Solomon's family and give Archer a second chance. Jennifer Connelly plays an American journalist whose idealism is tempered by a deepening connection with Archer(n)

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral (1994)
programme.desc: Craig Phillips, winner of Channel 4's Big Brother, introduces the first of his two favourite films. One of the most successful British films of all time, Mike Newell's now-classic 'feel-good' movie stars Hugh Grant and Andie McDowell as the couple who seem made for each other but seem intent on staying apart. Their central performances are brilliantly supported by Kristin Scott Thomas, James Fleet and Simon Callow(n)

programme.title: Throw Momma from the Train (1987)
programme.desc: An inept student offers to kill the ex-wife of his professor in exchange for the teacher murdering the student's mother(n)

programme.title: Dreamgirls (2006)
programme.desc: Based on the 1981 Tony award-winning Broadway musical, Dreamgirls is a story of dreams, stardom, and the high cost of success in the cutthroat recording industry. In the 1960s, singers Effie (Jennifer Hudson), Lorrell (Anika Noni Rose), and Deena (Beyoncé Knowles) are discovered at a local talent show by ambitious manager Curtis Taylor Jr. (Jamie Foxx). Named The Dreamettes, the trio is soon offered the once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to open for popular singer James Thunder Early (Eddie Murphy). Subsequently propelled into the spotlight as The Dreams, the girls quickly find their bid for the big time taking priority over friendship as Taylor demotes their hefty big-voiced lead singer Effie and puts the softer-voiced looker Deena in front(n)

programme.title: 3 1/2 Minutes, Ten Bullets (2015)
programme.desc: A look at the 2012 murder of unarmed black teenager Jordan Davis at a Florida gas station, and the political and social fervor that surrounded the ensuing criminal investigation(n)

programme.title: Breakdown (1997)
programme.desc: Jeff and Amy Taylor (Kurt Russell and Kathleen Quinlan) are travelling cross country to California. When their Jeep breaks down, she accepts a lift from trucker J T Walsh to the nearest diner to call for help. But she fails to return and when Jeff eventually gets to the diner, no-one, including the trucker, has ever seen his wife... Jonathan Mostow's taut thriller shows a man trapped in a paranoid nightmare, trying to find his wife in the face of consistent denial of her very existence(n)

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: Segments include a report on elephant trophy hunting and ivory poaching in Africa; and a chat with hockey announcer Doc Emrick(n)

programme.title: Accepted (2006)
programme.desc: What happens when you want to go to college but no school accepts you? If you're Bartleby Gaines, you invent a fictitious university and create your own destiny. ACCEPTED follows the Ferris Bueller-esque Bartleby as he and his assembled crew of college rejects dupe the world by building the South Harmon Institute of Technology from scratch. There's his nerdy friend Sherman Schrader; the hyper-smart Rory; Hands, a football player who lost his scholarship when he blew out his knee.(n)

programme.title: Promised Land (2012)
programme.desc: A small-town schoolteacher launches a grassroots campaign against the representatives of an oil company, who want to buy the drilling rights for his community's land(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: Kevin hopes to conquer Patti once and for all, in an unusual arena, but any resolution could come at great personal cost(n)

programme.title: Calendar Girls (2003)
programme.desc: Chris (Helen Mirren) and Annie (Julie Walters) are two very different women who live in a small village in the Yorkshire Dales. Their friendship is put to the test just when their relationship needs to be stronger than ever. When Annie's husband dies of leukemia, Chris organizes a campaign to raise funds for the local hospital. Her plan is to produce a calendar featuring photographs of the village women performing their traditional tasks. But the proposal has an original twist: the women will pose in the nude. The pictures are known all across the country and the women become famous(n)
